ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor, FREE Power Box, & FREE 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable Included In The Package.
12 Cameras: 6*Bullet Cameras, 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Outdoor Camera, 1000 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Manual Varifocal Lens, 42PCS Infrared LED, 114 feet IR Distance. 0.01 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination. Metal vandal proof & water proof ;; 6*Dome Cameras, 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Indoor Camera, 1000 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Manual Varifocal Lens, 30PCS Infrared LED, 65 feet IR Distance. 0.01 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination.
16 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 4TB HDD, 960H/FD1 video input, 8 full Channel Realtime Playback; Support HDMI/VGA/BNC/SPOT/Loop Simultaneous Output; Support AVI Backup,Snapshot,Record Lock,Record Cutting; Support up to 8 Hard Drives.
iPhone/Android Viewable, PTZ Control.
FREE 1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support within U.S.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Enterprice CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 16 Channel DVR 8TB Hard Drive 960H/FD1 Full Channel Realtime Playback, 12 Cameras(6*Bullet & 6*Dome) 1000 TVL Vari-Focal Lens , iPhone Android Viewable
